name: Last Höpe
description:
Play as the last Höpe of the Earth !

Thurst your roots into the ground and make them emerge to defend yourself ! Deflect their projectiles and regenerate your health with their soul to help you survive.

Controls :

  • Press Left Arrow or Right Arrow to thrust a root
  • Release the button to make it emerge !

Made for the Global Game Jam 2023, which theme was Root !

Our insane silky team :

  • JuLie - Art
  • SpiCy - Art - Check out her lives on Twitch ! :O
  • EtriZe - Dev
  • Garya - Dev
  • P0ulpy - Dev -  Check out his GitHub ! :O
  • Krakhazblong - Dev, sound and music - Check out my itch ! :O

You can glance over our organized and very well coded project here : https://github.com/P0ulpy/Last-Hope

The music is on Youtube !
